urls.title: Penalties for drug law offences at a glance | www.emcdda.europa.eu
urls.description: Results hosted on duckduckgo.com On this page you can examine and compare the penalties, or rehabilitative responses, for the core offences of drug use, possession for personal use, and supply-related offences, across countries in Europe. It also allows you to see how those penalties vary according to the type or quantity of the drug, and the addiction or recidivism of the offender. Austria Use of drugs is not mentioned as an offence. There is no alternative to punishment for use, as it is not an offence.
